description: A comprehensive system to manage the production processes of a water pump company, from product design and materials requisition to production tracking and quality control.

sheets.name: Products

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each product

columns.name: ProductName
columns.description: Name of the product

columns.name: ProductType
columns.description: Type or category of the water pump

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: The date the product record was created

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: The date the product record was last modified

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Current status of the product

sheets.description: Master data for all water pump products

sheets.name: Materials

columns.name: MaterialID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each material

columns.name: MaterialName
columns.description: Name of the material

columns.name: UnitCost
columns.description: Cost per unit of material

columns.name: StockQuantity
columns.description: Current stock level of the material

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Reference to the ProductID that uses this material

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: The date the material record was created

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: The date the material record was last modified

columns.name: OrderID

columns.name: Status

columns.name: CreatedDate

columns.name: ModifiedDate
columns.description: The date the production order record was last modified
